title: 🌿 Eye Rest - Look 20 meters away
description: Look away from your screen and focus on something 20 meters away for 20 seconds. Do this slowly, breathe deeply, and repeat multiple times for 5 minutes to help relax your eye muscles, reduce strain, and improve focus.

title: 💧 Blink 10 times
description: Gently blink your eyes 10 times to moisten the cornea and prevent dry eyes.

title: 💆 Gently roll your neck 3 times each side
description: Sit up straight, slowly roll your neck clockwise 3 times then counterclockwise.

title: 🧘 Stretch arms, shoulders, deep breath 3 times
description: Stand up, stretch your arms and shoulders, inhale for 4s – hold for 2s – exhale for 6s. Repeat 3 times.

title: 🌊 Deep breathing 4–2–6
description: Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 2 seconds, exhale for 6 seconds. Repeat 3 times.

title: 🤲 Shake hands 10 times
description: Relax your wrists, gently shake 10 times to relax the muscles in your wrists and shoulders.

title: 💪 Roll shoulders 5 times
description: Lift your shoulders up – roll backward – lower them down. Do 5 times to reduce shoulder muscle tension.

title: 🖐️ Cover eyes to relax
description: Rub your hands together to warm them up, gently place your palms over your eyes and relax for 20 seconds.
